#### Description

``is.distances`` checks whether the provided object is a valid instance of the distances class.

#### Usage
<pre><code>
is.distances(x)
</code></pre>

#### Arguments
* ``x``: object to check.

#### Value
Returns TRUE if x is a valid distances object, otherwise FALSE.
